title: 32bit build warning
body:
```
g++  -fno-PIE -c  -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/lex -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/parse -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/analysis -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/backend -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir/tree -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/util -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/privacy -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/lint -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/util -DIN_GCC_FRONTEND -g -O0     -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings   -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Irust -I../../gccrs/gcc -I../../gccrs/gcc/rust -I../../gccrs/gcc/../include -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libcpp/include -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libcody  -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libdecnumber -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libdecnumber/bid -I../libdecnumber -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libbacktrace   -o rust/rust-session-manager.o -MT rust/rust-session-manager.o -MMD -MP -MF rust/.deps/rust-session-manager.TPo ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc: In function ‘bool Rust::validate_crate_name(const string&, Rust::Error&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:102:22: warning: format ‘%ld’ expects argument of type ‘long int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        kMaxNameLength);
                      ^

g++  -fno-PIE -c  -DIN_GCC_FRONTEND -g -O0     -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings   -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Irust -I../../gccrs/gcc -I../../gccrs/gcc/rust -I../../gccrs/gcc/../include -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libcpp/include -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libcody  -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libdecnumber -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libdecnumber/bid -I../libdecnumber -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libbacktrace   -o rust/rust-macro-expand.o -MT rust/rust-macro-expand.o -MMD -MP -MF rust/.deps/rust-macro-expand.TPo -std=c++11 -Wno-unused-parameter -Werror=overloaded-virtual -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/lex -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/parse -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/analysis -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/backend -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir/tree -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/util -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/privacy -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/lint -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/util ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-expand.cc
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-expand.cc: In member function ‘bool Rust::MacroExpander::match_repetition(Rust::Parser<Rust::MacroInvocLexer>&, Rust::AST::MacroMatchRepetition&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-expand.cc:710:52: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 5 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
      lo_str.c_str (), hi_str.c_str (), match_amount);
                                                    ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-expand.cc:713:58: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
     res ? "successfully" : "unsuccessfully", match_amount);
                                                          ^

g++  -fno-PIE -c  -DIN_GCC_FRONTEND -g -O0     -DIN_GCC     -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wmissing-format-attribute -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings   -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Irust -I../../gccrs/gcc -I../../gccrs/gcc/rust -I../../gccrs/gcc/../include -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libcpp/include -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libcody  -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libdecnumber -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libdecnumber/bid -I../libdecnumber -I../../gccrs/gcc/../libbacktrace   -o rust/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.o -MT rust/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.o -MMD -MP -MF rust/.deps/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.TPo -std=c++11 -Wno-unused-parameter -Werror=overloaded-virtual -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/lex -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/parse -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/analysis -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/backend -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir/tree -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/util -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/privacy -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/lint -I ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/util ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc: In member function ‘bool Rust::SubstituteCtx::check_repetition_amount(size_t, size_t, size_t&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc:91:45: warning: format ‘%ld’ expects argument of type ‘long int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
    expected_repetition_amount, repeat_amount);
                                             ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc:91:45: warning: format ‘%ld’ expects argument of type ‘long int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
In file included from ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/parse/rust-parse.h:22:0,
                 from ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-expand.h:23,
                 from ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.h:20,
                 from ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc:1:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc: In member function ‘std::vector<std::unique_ptr<Rust::AST::Token> > Rust::SubstituteCtx::substitute_repetition(size_t, size_t, std::unique_ptr<Rust::AST::Token>)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-diagnostics.h:143:65: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
 #define rust_debug(...) rust_debug_loc (Location (), __VA_ARGS__)
                                                                 ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/expand/rust-macro-substitute-ctx.cc:113:3: note: in expansion of macro ‘rust_debug’
   rust_debug ("repetition amount to use: %lu", repeat_amount);
   ^~~~~~~~~~

../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc: In member function ‘Rust::TyTy::SubstitutionArgumentMappings Rust::TyTy::SubstitutionRef::get_mappings_from_generic_args(Rust::HIR::GenericArgs&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:645:54: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘std::vector<Rust::TyTy::SubstitutionParamMapping>::size_type {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
  substitutions.size (), args.get_type_args ().size ());
                                                      ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:645:54: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘std::vector<std::unique_ptr<Rust::HIR::Type> >::size_type {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:657:71: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
  (min_required_substitutions () - offs), args.get_type_args ().size ());
                                                                       ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:657:71: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘std::vector<std::unique_ptr<Rust::HIR::Type> >::size_type {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc: In member function ‘virtual void Rust::TyTy::TypeCheckCallExpr::visit(Rust::TyTy::ADTType&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3184:49: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params (), variant.num_fields ());
                                                 ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3184:49: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3216:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params ());
                          ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3216:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc: In member function ‘virtual void Rust::TyTy::TypeCheckCallExpr::visit(Rust::TyTy::FnType&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3235:47: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
         call.num_params (), type.num_params ());
                                               ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3235:47: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3243:43: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
     call.num_params (), type.num_params ());
                                           ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3243:43: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3284:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params ());
                          ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3284:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc: In member function ‘virtual void Rust::TyTy::TypeCheckCallExpr::visit(Rust::TyTy::FnPtr&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3299:46: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params (), type.num_params ());
                                              ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3299:46: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3334:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params ());
                          ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3334:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc: In member function ‘virtual void Rust::TyTy::TypeCheckMethodCallExpr::visit(Rust::TyTy::FnType&)’:
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3354:46: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params (), type.num_params ());
                                              ^
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3354:46: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 4 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3389:26: warning: format ‘%lu’ expects argument of type ‘long unsigned int’, but argument 3 has type ‘size_t {aka unsigned int}’ [-Wformat=]
        call.num_params ());
                          ^
```
